title: Pinnacles National Park: Lodging
body: Lodging       Pinnacles National Park has a designated campground. For reservations call (831) 389-4538 or www.recreation.gov San Benito CountyChamber of Commerce (831) 637-5315 www.sanbenitocountychamber.com San Juan BautistaChamber of Commerce (831) 623-2454 www.sanjuanbautista.com King City Chamber of Commerce  (831) 385-3814 www.kingcity.com Salinas Valley Chamber of Commerce   (831) 424-7611 www.salinaschamber.com Monterey Peninsula Chamber of Commerce www.mpcc.com
